The One-Minute Organizer A to Z Storage Solutions,500 Tips,Organic Body Care,Glowing Skin Classic Household Projects and Recipes - Mantesh

4 self-help ebooks .........

1. The One-Minute Organizer A to Z Storage Solutions: 500 Tips for Storing Every Item in Your Home 

Donna Smallin - 2008 - ISBN: 1603420843 - PDF,EPUB,MOBI

Got a minute? That's all it takes to conquer clutter! Organizing guru Donna Smallin offers hundreds of quick tips for storing all your household items.

============

2. The One-Minute Organizer Plain & Simple: 500 Tips for Getting Your Life in Order Paperback


Donna Smallin - 2004 - ISBN-10: 1580175848 - PDF,EPUB,MOBI

Every day, in every way, you can get just a little more organized in just a few minutes.

For instance, when you take your clothes off, hang them up or put them in the laundry. Throw out that pile of mail-order catalogs you still haven't flipped through. Limit yourself to saving one tote-bag-full of housecleaning rags.

==================

3. Organic Body Care Recipes: 175 Homemade Herbal Formulas for Glowing Skin & a Vibrant Self

Stephanie Tourles - 2007 - ISBN: 1580176763 - PDF,MOBI 

Radiantly healthy skin, hair, feet, hands, eyes, and nails. Commercial beauty products make this promise every day and live up to it with varying degrees of success

================

4. Home Sweet Home: Rediscovering the Joys of Domesticity with Classic Household Projects and Recipes

Sarah Tomczak - ISBN: 0762781289 - 2012 - PDF,EPUB,MOBI

Home Sweet Home brings you 100 simple, traditional projects and advice that will reintroduce you to the joy of making things by hand and the pleasure of a home filled with individuality and charm. From making all-natural surface cleaner and removing stains to cooking the perfect Sunday roast, to laying a table and hosting a party, this sweet little book will not only help you create a cozy home but will also save you money. Today, a whole new generation is discovering the value, and pleasure, of making things for themselves, their homes, and their families.
